description.author: Oliver Charles
description.description:
The package supports multiple rendering backends.
Set package flags according to your needs.

package-flags.name: disable-obsolete
package-flags.description: Don't define obsolete functions/enums/behaviors. Consider enabling from time to time after updating to avoid using soon-to-be obsolete function/names.

package-flags.name: use-wchar32
package-flags.description: Use 32-bit for ImWchar (default is 16-bit) to support unicode planes 1-16. (e.g. point beyond 0xFFFF like emoticons, dingbats, symbols, shapes, ancient languages, etc...)
